name: Aisling Group
description:
Aisling is committed to providing our candidate community with access to better future opportunities and the precise skills that would enable them to build their experiences as well as professional networks. 
 And our customers can rely on our consistent focus to provide innovative solutions that enhance customer experience and impact business results. Aisling is a Talent Solutions company founded in 2016 by Melissa Norman and a UK investor, Miles Hunt of Benula Capital. As we grow, Aisling continues to enlist talented and like-minded individuals with vast experiences within the HR field to serve our customers and candidate community exceptionally.
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees
sub_categories: Software and Services Related to HR Software
Headline:
Leading the charge
 to humanize talent acquisition
ShortDescription: Aisling Group emphasize on the areas of Outsourcing, Talent Acquisition and Talent Development.
enhanced_description: Aisling Group is a Talent Solutions company founded in 2016, with a core mission to humanize talent acquisition. They specialize in Outsourcing, Talent Acquisition, and Talent Development. Aisling is dedicated to providing candidates with access to future opportunities, skill development, and professional networking. For their customers, they deliver innovative and customized solutions designed to enhance customer experience, impact business results, and achieve key objectives such as hiring top talent faster, more efficiently, and at a reduced cost.
key_use_cases: Talent acquisition and recruitment process optimization
Outsourcing of HR and recruitment functions
Talent development and skill building for candidates
Reducing the cost of hiring qualified employees
Enhancing hiring manager confidence and productivity
competitive_advantages: Focus on innovative solutions that enhance customer experience and impact business results
Team with vast experience within the HR field
roi_benefits: Increased efficiency and productivity for hiring managers
Enhanced business results through optimized talent strategies
